activities.name: Stress Meter
activities.activity_info: Takes a quiz of the user and gives a number on the scale of 10 (SGPA). The next quiz will update the SGPA into CSGPA.

activities.name: Fidgeting
activities.activity_info: Includes two fidgeting activities: Tap/Tap and Random Tap.

activities.name: Concentration Music
activities.activity_info: Provides a list of pre-installed relaxing music.
